questionsAndAnswers.question: What are your store hours?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We are open from 9am to 9pm every day.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Where is your store located?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We are located at 123 Main St, Anytown, USA.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer online shopping?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you can shop online at our website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is your return policy?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You can return any item within 30 days of purchase.
